biotools.summary: The tool contains classes and methods to help the analysis of whole genome association studies. It utilizes S4 classes and extends haplo.stats R package to facilitate haplotype analyses. The package is useful to carry out most common analysis when performing whole genome association studies.

bioschemas.name: SNPAssoc
